DOC.brief_summary: This is a randomized control trial (RCT) that studies the surgical conditions during moderate and deep neuromuscular blockade in 100 morbidly obese patients receiving elective laparoscopic surgery for bariatric surgery.
DOC.brief_title: Effect of Deep Neuromuscular Block on Surgical Conditions in Morbidly Obese Patients
DOC.criteria: ASA IIII BMI > 34 kg/m2 Elective bariatric surgery. Known or suspected neuromuscular disorders impairing neuromuscular function Allergies to muscle relaxants, anesthetics or narcotics A(family) history of malignant hyperthermia Women who are or may be pregnant or are currently breast feeding Renal insufficiency, as defined by serum creatinine x 2 of normal, or urine output < 0.5 ml/kg/h for at least 6 h.
